title: March 8th, 2021 - Rick & Bubba Show

Sponsor:
My Patriot Supply - Survival Supplies & Emergency Preparedness Gear - Trusted Self-Reliance & Food Independence The original Patriot survival company. My Patriot Supply was founded by people with a passion for self-sufficiency and food independence. They not only understand the drive to practice emergency preparedness, but we are also active participants in the survivalist lifestyle. They believe that true freedom comes from attaining a certain level of self-reliance. Right now SAVE $50.00 off a Four-week supply of their delicious meals that give you Two-Thousand-Plus calories a day. PrepareWithRickandBubba.com
